title: My skin got refunded when i didnt do it?
body: i hopped on league today to play and out of no where i got 1350 rp extra on my account. i didnt do anything to get it so i thought it was from a friend. but when i checked who gave it to me it didnt say anyone did. so i spent the rp happily but when i was looking for another skin to buy i seen my "meowkai" skin was available after i bought it a few weeks before. now im confused in what happens because i dont have that skin anymore! please someone help i really want that skin back.

replies.body: We don't want to share sensitive account information on the boards, but don't worry!  Reach out to our [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) team, and we can provide context to your specific issue in a ticket.
HEY LIKE WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON NOW! MY BLOODMOON YASUO SKIN ISNT THERE EITHER NOT! I DIDNT EVEN GET MY RP BACK! LIKE WHAT IS HAPPENING TO MY SKINS!
Did you submit a request as Porocles mentioned?
i did but nothing happened yet! i even have proof i bought both of the skins and they are now gone! has this happened to anyone else???

Not that I'm aware of. It seems to be isolated to you which is why this needs to be resolved through Billing & Store Support. We would not be able to assist you further on the Boards.

Please await a reply to your ticket from Billing & Store Support.
could you send me a link to that, i cant seem to find it

If you have already submitted a request, click "Support" to the mid top of your screen and click "My Tickets".

---

If you haven't already submitted a request;

Get in touch with Riot’s [Billing & Store Support Centre](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=4584)


* The primary category is already chosen. 


 * Under the secondary select **Billing & Store.**


  * For the tertiary category select **Content Refund**


http://lolwp.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/07/Debonair-Ezreal.jpg
